About
The Company Our Team
Contact Us

Handpoint pioneered mobile payments

and is now at the forefront of EMV, contactless and mobile technologies

What do we do ?

At Handpoint, we are tech-enablers, our role is to offer a simple interface for developers to add integrated card payment solutions into their mobile, tablet or PC point-of-sale.

We developed beautifully simple API's for our sleek and modern card readers while taking an extra step in security by being the first to implement a PCI-P2PE solution for mobile point of sale.

By building simple yet powerful products we allow developers to focus on delivering a seamless experience to their users, without having to spend months on integrations and payment certifications.

Company Facts

Founded

Handpoint was founded in Iceland back in 1999 to develop software on the first generation of PALM devices.

the company has greatly evolved since then but has always believed in the power of mobile technologies.

That is the reason why since 2009 we are focusing on mobile payments.

Core Business

We power payments for the next Generation of point of sale systems (mobile & tablets) #NextGenPos.

We have mastered EMV, contactless and point to point encryption to offer a secure and simple solution for our partners.

Our goal is to make accepting card payments a piece of cake.

Products

Sleek card readers allowing merchants to start accepting card payments within minutes.

An API for developers to integrate their mobile applications with our card readers.

A payment gateway with connections to multiple processors around the world.

Funding raised

$6M institutional investment

Headquarters

Reykjavik, Iceland

Our Motto

Simplifying card payments

My team can move payments mountains and we're lucky to have allthis Icelandic talent at our fingertips. Creating the right enabling technology to be the necessary glue in payments is a lot easier when you have great talent that has understanding of the market, experience and background in FinTech and from an economy where nearly all payments are digital

David Gudjonsson
CEO & Co-Founder | Handpoint
